dataset.title: The contribution of carbon sequestration and carbon dioxide reduction by platform wooden construction buildings

abstract.para: The objective of this study was to evaluate the CO2 emission and carbon sequestration under the platform (2×4) wooden construction buildings in Taiwan. A total 18 platform (2×4) wooden construction buildings were selected for calculating the CO2 emission, which generated from construction materials’ energy consumption. The results indicated that the usage of wood materials in per unit construction area was 0.2083 m3/m2 ; the CO2 emission in per unit construction area were 75.67 kg/m2. By comparing the wooden construction to reinforced concrete (RC) and steel prefabricated (S) construction, the CO2 emission reduction of the wooden construction can reach 362.38 kg/ m2 and 313.21 kg/m2, respectively. The results clearly proved the 2×4 wooden construction buildings have significances in CO2 reduction and carbon storage.

section.title: 木質材料消耗能源排放CO2量之評估
section.para: 經由測定各種木質材料（木材、合板、集成材、粒片板、防腐材等）在各製程所消耗電量後，再依台電公司所統計，每消耗1度電量約相當於排放0.54kg CO2進行推算。

section.title: 木質構造建築消耗能源CO2排放量評估
section.para: 調查各種木質構造建築每1 m2 坪所使用之主要結構材料，包含混凝土、鋼筋、木質材料之數量，再依各種材料製造時消耗能源，所排放之碳素量。

section.title: 建築物CO2排放量評估
section.para: 將所有建築物結構體的建材(暫不包括水電、設備、室內裝潢、家具等資材)，由各項建材的實際使用量與各建材之單位CO2排放量，累算求得建築物結構體的CO2排放量

section.title: 木質構造建築對於CO2減量評估
section.para: (木質構造建築每m2 之碳素貯存量kg〕＋〔非木質構造建築（RC造），或（S造），每m2所排放碳素量kg〕-〔木質構造建築每m2之碳素排放量kg〕＝〔木質構造建築取代非木質構造建築而削減碳素排放量kg〕，將所得碳素量×3.6即等於CO2削減量。
